headline: How Weaker 2025 Results, New Guidance and Buybacks At ON Semiconductor (ON) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In February 2026, ON Semiconductor reported that fourth-quarter 2025 sales fell to US$1,530.1 million and net income to US$181.8 million, while full-year 2025 sales declined to US$5.99 billion and net income to US$121 million, alongside new first-quarter 2026 guidance and ongoing share repurchases under its multi-year buyback programs. Despite weaker recent results, management highlighted signs of market stabilization, sequential growth in automotive and industrial sales, and continued...

headline: Barclays Sees Microchip Technology (MCHP) Less Sensitive to Industrial Demand Swings
summary: Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP) is included among the 13 Best NASDAQ Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. On February 12, Barclays analyst Tom O’Malley initiated coverage of Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP) with an Equal Weight rating. The analyst set an $80 price target on the stock. He said the company has a “more moderate correlation” with […]
